overview_of_class:
Few - if any - journalistic disciplines afford the range that sports writing does.?? Deadline journalism (game stories), features, profiles, investigative, historical and first person pieces are all fair game on the sports page, with venerable traditions.?

Students in this course will explore all of these genres - through reading, lecture and discussion - and practice in each, as well, through a workshop format with their peers.
???
You do not need to be interested in sports writing or even sports to succeed in this course - only good journalism and good story telling.? You will also be held to a very high level of professional conduct.?
name: Sports Reporting
subject: JOUR
